text:
\define template(tagg, countlabel) <> <>
<$button><$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" title="New $tagg$ organization" $fields$ tags="organization $tagg$" />{{$:/core/images/new-button}} $tagg$ organization
<$list filter="[tag[organization]tag[$tagg$]search:title{$:/config/References/searchstrings!!organization-search}sort[title]]"> <$link to=<>><$view field='title'/>
<$list filter={{!!people}}> <$link to=<>><$view field='title'/>
<$list filter={{!!place}}> <$link to=<>><$view field='title'/>
\end <$macrocall $name="template" tagg={{!!tagg}} countlabel={{!!countlabel}} />
title: $:/plugins/cls/mk/organizationtemplate
